# PED::IS_PED_MALE

## Summary
Checks if the ped is a male ped. Do not call this on a player ped. Use '!IS_PLAYER_FEMALE' instead.

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns true/false if the ped is/isn't male.
